body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Richardson's Driving School customer service. My name is Arthur Richardson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. How can I assist you today? Before we start, could you kindly provide me with your date of birth and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is the second of August, one nine eight five. You can reach me at seven zero four five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Sarah. Is there anything specific you need help with regarding our driving school service?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a question. How many driving instructors do you have available for lessons on weekends?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We currently have three driving instructors available on weekends to ensure flexibility for our students. Is there anything else you would like to inquire about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm also curious about the duration of your driving lessons. How long is each session?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Our driving lessons typically run for one hour each to provide ample time for learning and practice. I hope that helps to answer your question. Thank you so much for reaching out, Sarah. If you require further assistance, feel free to contact us again. Have a great day!
